mapper.sql: id, title, content, yhzh, createId, createTime, isdeleted,enclosure
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into security_inf (title, content, yhzh, createId, createTime, isdeleted,enclosure) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update security_inf set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enclosure = #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update security_inf set isdeleted = '1' where id = #{id}
